title: Banned because hacked intentionnal feeding
body: Hello guys i need help i think someone hacked my account trolled one game and fed so i get banned for intentionnal feeding for 14 days i can t access my email [](https://puu.sh/vvygF/c18c339c67.png) as you see i don t intentionnaly feed at all you can look at my matches history i try my best even when we are losing i m devastated by this news pleaase i need your help i really love league i can prove that this is my account with my paypal the one i payed with my skins and champions please guys help me unbann me i know you can get perma ban for intentionnaly feeding that s why i never done it i was too scared to lose all the money i spent in the game since i m not very rich please unban me and find the guy who did that to me i didn t know i would feel so scared after seing that youve been banned for 14 days for feeding my heart nearly stopped till i saw in match history a match got played in the morning 0-16 caitlyn even i m not that bad to do this if there s a way i can help please let me know i m ready to do anything to get unbanned thank you a lot

replies.body:
Make a support ticket explaining your situation here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Do not bump the ticket as that will put it at the end of the queue. While you wait for a response make sure you change your password and the password to your email address attached to your account.

You can indeed sent in a support ticket, and they'll investigate the situation.

I'm a little suspicious though -- in addition to the 0/16/0 Caitlyn game from yesterday, you have a 0/13/0 and a 0/19/1 Syndra game from 9 days ago with the same starting signs -- purchase of starting items and then nothing else all game. There are more 0/11/1 and 0/9/0 Syndra games from 22 days ago where your build stalled out with unspent gold and your XP flatlined mid-game as well.

So either someone has been on your account for a while, or there's probably more to this story.
